text: ane te vatanum pana varnana karo, jyare inkara karanara'o'e tamara mate yukti kari rahya hata, ke tamane kedi banavi le, athava tamane katala kari de athava tamane desanikala kari de ane te to potani yukti kari rahya hata ane allaha potani yukti kari rahyo hato ane sauthi vadhare majabuta yukti karanara allaha ja che
